It is also recommended to not place these subnets alongside each other, e.g. a layout similar to the following is recommended. VLAN-1: x.x.10.0/23, VLAN-2: x.x.20.0/23, VLAN-3: x.x.30.0/23.

nameserverB.description:
If the IP given does not act as a DNS server and answer DNS requests there may be delays at login time post installation.
The DB cluster doesn't require DNS name solution so DNS servers can be unreachable from DB cluster.
However, in case if any DNS server is reachable from DB cluster,
ensure its IP is the first entry of the server list (DNS Server A) to prevent a failed installation caused by resolver timeout.

nameserverA.description:
If the IP given does not act as a DNS server and answer DNS requests there may be delays at login time post installation.
The DB cluster doesn't require DNS name solution so DNS servers can be unreachable from DB cluster.
However, in case if any DNS server is reachable from DB cluster,
ensure its IP is the first entry of the server list (DNS Server A) to prevent a failed installation caused by resolver timeout.

smrs_sftp_securePort.description: Operator has to choose an unused port within the range 1025-65535 if choosing not to use default port 22.
smrs_sftp_securePort.htmlDescription:
Note:

1) smrs_sftp_securePort and smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable are not accessible at run time so any change will require ENM installation or upgrade.
2) The above SED parameters are meant for Network having only Radio and RadioTNodes.
3) Based upon the above SED parameter values, the operations like Node Software Upgrade, License installation, Backup and Restore, Netlog, AMOS, Element Manager, General Scripting, Release Independence Manager will be impacted in the Network .

The SED parameter(smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable) value can be assigned true or false based on the Network Topology.

Smrs_sftp_securePort

Smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable

Network made of

ENM operations based on SFTP (SW upgrade, licence installation, Backup and Restore, netlog, Autointegration, Performance management)

22

Either True or False

RadioNode & RadioTNode only
OR
NON RadioNode, & NON RadioTNode nodes
OR
Mixed Nodes

All SFTP based services run successfully.
SFTP port used is always 22.

Other than 22

FALSE

RadioNode and RadioTNode only

All SFTP based services run successfully.
SFTP port takes value from smrs_sftp_securePort
Spectrum_analyser use cases uses SFTP on port 22.

Other than 22

FALSE

NON RadioNode & NON RadioTNode nodes

All SFTP based services run successfully.
SFTP port used is always 22.

Other than 22

FALSE

Mixed nodes

All SFTP based services run successfully.
RadioNode and RadioTNode:
-SFTP port takes value from smrs_sftp_securePort.
-Spectrum_analyser use cases uses SFTP on port 22
Nodes other than RadioNode and RadioTNode node
-SFTP port used is always 22.

Other than 22

TRUE

RadioNode and RadioTNode only

All SFTP based services run successfully.
SFTP port takes value from smrs_sftp_securePort
Spectrum_analyser use cases uses SFTP on port 22

Other than 22

NON RadioNode & NON RadioTNode nodes

All SFTP based services will fail.

RadioNode and RadioTNode:
- SFTP port takes value from smrs_sftp_securePort
- Spectrum_analyser use cases uses SFTP on port 22
Nodes other than RadioNode and RadioTNode node
- All SFTP based services will fail

longDescription: It is only required if upgrading from 22.01 (R1EY) or earlier or if performing an initial installation on Rackmount Servers.
In an IPv4-only or dual-stack deployment this is an IPv4 address. The address is on (or can route to) the ENM services VLAN.
In an IPv6-only deployment this is an IPv6 address and is on (or can route to) ENM services VLAN and can route to ENM Management (iLO) network.
For example, if using an OMBS as external client for upgrade, this parameter is set to the OMBS ENM services IP.
In a deployment where ENM Management (iLO) network is non-routable, set this to be the IP of the external client on the ENM Management (iLO) network.,

smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable.description: This flag, when set to true, enables hardening of ENM for use cases like SW upgrade, licence installation, Backup and Restore, netlog, Auto integration against RadioNode and RadioTNode. It breaks these use cases on all other nodes type (e.g. SIU/TCU, Minilink, EnodeB , BSC, Router6K etc).
smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable.htmlDescription:
Note:

1) smrs_sftp_securePort and smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable are not accessible at run time so any change will require ENM installation or upgrade.
2) The above SED parameters are meant for Network having only Radio and RadioTNodes.
3) Based upon the above SED parameter values, the operations like Node Software Upgrade, License installation, Backup and Restore, Netlog, AMOS, Element Manager, General Scripting, Release Independence Manager will be impacted in the Network .

The SED parameter(smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable) value can be assigned true or false based on the Network Topology.

longDescription: The multicast_snooping property is used to enable or disable multicast snooping (br0). By default this should be set to 1.
If the property is set to 0 (disabled), then set multicast_querier=0, multicast_router=1 and hash_max=512 (recommended value).
If the property is set to 1 (enabled), then set multicast_querier=1, multicast router=2 and hash_max=4096 (recommended value).
